name: Blocky Story: War Craft
description:
Blocky Story: War Craft is a real-time strategy (RTS) in which you control an army of residents (humans) and creatures (undeads) of fantasy world under the leadership of the hero.

Game features:
- voxel graphic
- 3 basic materials
- 5 playable heroes with spells
- 2 races, each with 6 types of unit and building
- unit upgrades
- interesting story
- survival mode
- addictive gameplay
